00035 void
00036 RequestCache::insert(uint32_t id, IOHandler *handler, DispatchHandler *dh,
00037                      boost::xtime &expire) {
00038   CacheNode *node = new CacheNode;
00039 
00040   HT_DEBUGF("Adding id %d", id);
00041 
00042   IdHandlerMap::iterator iter = m_id_map.find(id);
00043 
00044   HT_ASSERT(iter == m_id_map.end());
00045 
00046   node->id = id;
00047   node->handler = handler;
00048   node->dh = dh;
00049   memcpy(&node->expire, &expire, sizeof(expire));
00050 
00051   if (m_head == 0) {
00052     node->next = node->prev = 0;
00053     m_head = m_tail = node;
00054   }
00055   else {
00056     node->next = m_tail;
00057     node->next->prev = node;
00058     node->prev = 0;
00059     m_tail = node;
00060   }
00061 
00062   m_id_map[id] = node;
00063 }
00064 
00065 
00066 DispatchHandler *RequestCache::remove(uint32_t id) {
00067 
00068   HT_DEBUGF("Removing id %d", id);
00069 
00070   IdHandlerMap::iterator iter = m_id_map.find(id);
00071 
00072   if (iter == m_id_map.end()) {
00073     HT_DEBUGF("ID %d not found in request cache", id);
00074     return 0;
00075   }
00076 
00077   CacheNode *node = (*iter).second;
00078 
00079   if (node->prev == 0)
00080     m_tail = node->next;
00081   else
00082     node->prev->next = node->next;
00083 
00084   if (node->next == 0)
00085     m_head = node->prev;
00086   else
00087     node->next->prev = node->prev;
00088 
00089   m_id_map.erase(iter);
00090 
00091   DispatchHandler *dh = node->dh;
00092   delete node;
00093   return dh;
00094 }

00098 DispatchHandler *
00099 RequestCache::get_next_timeout(boost::xtime &now, IOHandler *&handlerp,
00100                                boost::xtime *next_timeout) {
00101 
00102   while (m_head && xtime_cmp(m_head->expire, now) <= 0) {
00103 
00104     IdHandlerMap::iterator iter = m_id_map.find(m_head->id);
00105     assert (iter != m_id_map.end());
00106     CacheNode *node = m_head;
00107     if (m_head->prev) {
00108       m_head = m_head->prev;
00109       m_head->next = 0;
00110     }
00111     else
00112       m_head = m_tail = 0;
00113 
00114     m_id_map.erase(iter);
00115 
00116     if (node->handler != 0) {
00117       handlerp = node->handler;
00118       DispatchHandler *dh = node->dh;
00119       delete node;
00120       return dh;
00121     }
00122     delete node;
00123   }
00124 
00125   if (m_head)
00126     memcpy(next_timeout, &m_head->expire, sizeof(boost::xtime));
00127   else
00128     memset(next_timeout, 0, sizeof(boost::xtime));
00129 
00130   return 0;
00131 }

00134 
00135 void RequestCache::purge_requests(IOHandler *handler) {
00136   for (CacheNode *node = m_tail; node != 0; node = node->next) {
00137     if (node->handler == handler) {
00138       HT_DEBUGF("Purging request id %d", node->id);
00139       handler->deliver_event(new Event(Event::ERROR,
00140           ((IOHandlerData *)handler)->get_address(),
00141           Error::COMM_REQUEST_TIMEOUT), node->dh);
00142       node->handler = 0;  // mark for deletion
00143     }
00144   }
00145 }
